T03D3810:314a-30: ming rnams nyid kyis yongs bstan byas //
T03D3810:314a-31: 'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste //
T03D3810:314a-32: 'du shes tsam la rab tu gnas //
T03D3810:314a-33: rjod byed las ni gzhan gyur pa //
T03D3810:314a-34: brjod par bya ba yod ma yin //
T03D3810:314a-36: 'dri bar byed pa thams cad 'phags pa rab 'byor
T03D3810:314a-37: gyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3810:314a-38: gnyis ka gsal bar gyur pa de bshad pa'i phyir
T03D3810:314a-39: gsungs pa ni rab 'byor gyis ni zhes bya ba
T03D3810:314a-40: la sogs pa'o // rab 'byor gyis ni rjod byed
T03D3810:314a-41: nyid du 'dod pa'i sgra dang brjod bya nyid du
T03D3810:314a-42: 'dod pa'i sgra'i don gnyis ka 'gog cing sel ba
T03D3810:314a-43: la sogs pa'o // na'o // ji ltar zhe na /
T03D3810:314a-44: rab 'byor de'i sa byang chub sems dpa'i ming dang
T03D3810:314a-45: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ma mthong
T03D3810:314a-46: ngo zhes ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3810:314a-48: smras par gyur te gnyis ka yang kun brtags pa'i phyir ro zhes bsam pa'o //
T03D3810:314a-49: mngon par 'dod pa'i don nye bar sdud pa'i thabs
T03D3810:314a-50: kyis sgra gzhan nyid tsam yin yang ngag gi don
T03D3810:314a-51: rtogs pa nyid do zhes ston par byed pa gsungs
T03D3810:314a-52: pa ni / shes rab pha rol phyin ngag gang //
T03D3810:314a-53: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3810:314a-54: ji skad brjod zin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3810:314b-0: tu @314b phyin pa de dang 'brel ba'i ngag gang
T03D3810:314b-1: zhig 'di tsam gyis rtogs pa min pa ste /
T03D3810:314b-2: ma bshad cing rnam par ma phye ba de ni med cing mi srid kyi /
T03D3810:314b-3: 'on kyang rnam grangs gzhan du brjod pa'i ngag thams cad nyid kyang don rtogs pa kho na'o //
T03D3810:314b-4: ji ltar don rtogs she na /
T03D3810:314b-6: ji skad brjod zin pa'i bshad pa'i sgo nas so //
T03D3810:314b-8: rnams kyis zhib mo'i blo yis dpyod //
T03D3810:314b-9: ces bya ba la dpyod ces bya ba ni brtag par bya ba ste nges par bsams pa'o //
T03D3810:314b-12: sgra gzhan gyis brjod pa dag la yang yod pa
T03D3810:314b-13: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid can rnams so
T03D3810:314b-15: de shes pa rnams kyis te ngag gi don shes pa rnams kyis so //
T03D3810:314b-16: de dag ji ltar dpyad par bya zhe na /
T03D3810:314b-17: brjod pa zhib mo'i blo yis te //
T03D3810:314b-18: shin tu phra ba'i blo yul gzhan du ma chags
T03D3810:314b-19: pa dang bral ba'i shes pa zhes bya ba'i don
T03D3810:314b-20: to // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
T03D3810:314b-21: gzugs brnyan gyi sgra thos pas da ni de'i don
T03D3810:314b-23: skabs kyi don ni spong ba dang //
T03D3810:314b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3810:314b-25: skabs zhes bya ba ni gnyug ma la brjod de /
T03D3810:314b-26: gnyug ma'i skabs su bab pa'i don de spong zhing
T03D3810:314b-27: gzhag pa ste de yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang
T03D3810:314b-28: / don gzhan rtogs pa gang yin pa zhes so
T03D3810:314b-29: sor nges pa'i don las don gzhan rtogs shing 'god
T03D3810:314b-30: pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3810:314b-31: mthong zhing thos pa de ni gzugs brnyan yin par
T03D3810:314b-32: / 'dod do // gzugs brnyan ni ltar bcos bu ste /
T03D3810:314b-34: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
T03D3810:314b-35: gang gi phyir gang zhig skabs kyi don 'chad par
T03D3810:314b-36: byas pa dang gang yang don gzhan 'dzin pa ni
T03D3810:314b-37: thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3810:314b-38: par gzugs brnyan gyi sgras brjod do zhes bya ba
T03D3810:314b-40: 'di nyid la dgongs nas shing rta chen po rnams kyis /
T03D3810:314b-41: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
T03D3810:314b-42: gzhan par bya bya ba chung zad med //
T03D3810:314b-43: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
T03D3810:314b-44: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
T03D3810:314b-46: da ni don gyi mjug bsdu ba bsdus te ston par brjod pa ni /
T03D3810:314b-47: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten can zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3810:314b-48: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
T03D3810:314b-49: brgya par bgrangs pa thams cad la yang gang zhig
T03D3810:314b-50: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rten can
T03D3810:314b-51: gyi bsdus don 'di tsam nyid yin te /
T03D3810:314b-53: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i
T03D3810:314b-54: ming can yin gyi lhag par gzhan ni yod pa
T03D3810:314b-55: ma yin no zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
T03D3810:314b-56: 'on kyang slar yang de nyid ni bzlas pa yin te /
T03D3810:314b-57: yang nas yang du bskyar ba yin no //
T03D3810:314b-58: don de ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhe na /
T03D3810:314b-59: brjod pa don gzhan la brten nas te /
T03D3810:315a-2: gang gi tshe dri ba po'i dbye bas 'di lta ste /
T03D3810:315a-3: phung po dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang sangs rgyas
T03D3810:315a-4: kyi chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams dri
T03D3810:315a-5: ba gzhan gyi sgo nas brten par gyur pa de'i
T03D3810:315a-6: tshe de nyid yang dang yang du bzlas pa yin
T03D3810:315a-7: no // yang na bsdus pa la dga' ba'i bstan
T03D3810:315a-8: par bya bar gyur pa'i don gzhan la brten nas
T03D3810:315a-9: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid can gyi dngos
T03D3810:315a-10: po'i don de nyid so sos sam mtha' dag bzlas
T03D3810:315a-11: no // pa yin no // da ni bdag nyid
T03D3810:315a-12: shin tu rgya che ba nyid du ston par byed
T03D3810:315a-13: pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus
T03D3810:315a-14: pa byas pa las su rung ba'i bsod nams kyi
T03D3810:315a-15: phung po sngo bar byed pa gsungs pa ni /
T03D3810:315a-16: shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni //
T03D3810:315a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3810:315a-18: shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni brgyad stong zhes
T03D3810:315a-19: bya ba ni bstan pa'i rang bzhin brgyad stong par
T03D3810:315a-20: bgrangs pa'o // yang dag tu ni bsdus pa yin //
T03D3810:315a-21: zhes bya ba ni don bsdus pa byas pa'o //
T03D3810:315a-23: yang dag ces bya ba ste phyin ci ma log par ro //
T03D3810:315a-24: thob ces bya ba ni rnyed pa'o //
T03D3810:315a-27: de dag par byed pas na bsod nams te /
T03D3810:315a-28: bsod nams des skye bo rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig pa'o //
T03D3810:315a-29: 'di skad du 'jig rten thams cad kyang shes rab
T03D3810:315a-30: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par
T03D3810:315a-31: dag pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug par son par
T03D3810:315a-32: gyur cig ces brjod pa yin no //
T03D3810:315a-33: gzhan min don dam pa yi tshig ni rnam par dpyod pa yis //
T03D3810:315a-34: bsdus pa'i rgya cher 'grel ba bdag gis brjod pa gang yin pa //
T03D3810:315a-35: de mthu las byung bsod nams bye brag rnams kyi 'jig rten 'di //
T03D3810:315a-36: blo gros mngon par rtogs bzhin da lta rnams dben
T03D3810:315a-37: rtogs gyur cig / dge slong bslab pa brgya ldan
T03D3810:315a-38: pas // sems la bsod nams gang bsgrubs des ;
T03D3810:315a-39: /'jig rten blo gros mngon rtogs shing //
T03D3810:315a-40: bdag kyang bsod nams thob ldan shog / rgya cher 'grel pa zab mo yi //
T03D3810:315a-41: tshul ston 'di ni tshigs bcad kyi //
T03D3810:315a-42: grangs ni bzhi bcu thams pa dang //
T03D3810:315a-43: bcas pa'i brgya phrag lnga yin no //
T03D3810:315a-44: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga nas nye bar sbyar ba /
T03D3810:315a-45: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus pa'i
T03D3810:315a-46: tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par 'grel pa slob dpon
T03D3810:315a-47: bla ma dkon mchog gsum gyi 'bangs kyis mdzad pa
T03D3810:315a-49: / kha che'i pandi ta thig le bum pa dang /
